title: Incorrect times in Calendar
content:
Times become incorrect after entering into calendar. eg I enter an appointment for 9am, add other details, and save. On refreshing the calendar, the time is showing as 10am. If I click on the event, and open, the time is still showing 10am. If I click the Edit button, this then shows the time as 9am. 
Have tried changing the System Timezone from auto to manual (+10hrs - Aus/Qld), and makes no difference.
Also have Business Calendar 2 installed, and by default, this shows the time as 10am, but if I change Settings>Times>Use home timezone, to 'selected', it corrects the issue (but not the setting I want, as this will show ALL appointments in home timezone time. even when travelling...)
Phone is fully updated (5 July, 2019)
Solution appreciated.
Thanks, John.
